list_items: [Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fix for a bug where displayed tooltips could no longer be hidden
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fix for a bug that occurred when switching to another list during editing
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fix for a bug where only the currently displayed part was sorted instead of the whole table
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fix for a bug where drag-and-drop was accidentally activated in text fields when trying to select something
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Added option to sort lists by a column and save this setting in user preferences
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Added several list functions that are stored in user preferences
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Added scrolling option in list overview area to keep long list names readable
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Lists are sorted alphabetically in the overview
[User management](/hub/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Fix for a bug where it was possible to create user groups with identical names
[Logs] - Fix for a number of bugs in the logs
[Peakboard Boxes](/hub/Peakboard_Hub_on_premise/en-hub_boxmanagement.html) - Peakboard Box detail page can only be opened if it is currently available
